SEARCH
Package authenticationpkg

Class AccountManager

java.lang.Object
authenticationpkg.AccountManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AccountManager extends Object implements Serializable
Used to store all AuthUser objects. Contains functions related to AuthUsers.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • writeSerializedObject

      public void writeSerializedObject()
      Used to write serialised accountDict to the AccountManager.dat file.

    • readSerializedObject

      public HashMap<String,AuthUser> readSerializedObject()
      Reads from the AccountManager.dat file to initialise accountDict.
      Returns:
      HashMap object with userID as key, AuthUser as value.

    • getInstance

      public static AccountManager getInstance()
      Gets an instance of the AccountManager. Ensures that only a single instance of AccountManager is created.
      Returns:
      AccountManager object

    • getAccountDict

      public HashMap<String,AuthUser> getAccountDict()
      Gets the accountDict of AccountManager.
      Returns:
      HashMap object with userID as key, AuthUser as value.

    • getAccount

      public AuthUser getAccount(String userID)
      Gets the AuthUser associated to userID.
      Parameters:
      userID - AuthUser's userID.
      Returns:
      AuthUser object that is associated with userID

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(AuthUser user, String newPassword)
      Changes the current password of the AuthUser to newPassword.
      Parameters:
      user - AuthUser object.
      newPassword - new password to change to.

    • changeName

      public void changeName(AuthUser user, String newName)
      Changes the current name of the AuthUser to newName.
      Parameters:
      user - AuthUser object.
      newName - new name to change to.

    • changeAccountType

      public void changeAccountType(AuthUser user, AuthUser newUser)
      Changes the account type of AuthUser object from user to newUser.
      Parameters:
      user - Current AuthUser object.
      newUser - New AuthUser object to change to.

    • toString

      public void toString(AuthUser user)
      Prints the account details associated with the AuthUser user object.
      Parameters:
      user - AuthUser object.

    • login

      public AuthUser login(String userID, String password)
      Gets the AuthUser object associated with the userID and password.
      Parameters:
      userID - userID used to login.
      password - Password used to login.
      Returns:
      AuthUser object associated with userID on successful login; throws an error if unsuccessful.
